title: Pool party skins. The new batch is going to come within the next few months.
body:
Who do you think they're for?

My guesses and why:

Illaoi (She still hasn't gotten a skin yet. They're obviously waiting to release it with the other skins.)

Ahri (High demand, + her orb can be a beach ball!)

Sivir (Her boomerang can be a BETTER DUCK. Or a lifesaver.)

Shen (He can whack you with a giant pool noodle! A GIANT POOL NOOOODLEEE!!!)
